rules_text:
Dormant {2} [i](You may cast this spell for its dormant cost. If you do, it isn't a creature.)[/i]
You may spend mana to cast your first spell or activate your first ability each turn as though it were mana of any color.
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: If Crystalline Behemoth isn't a creature, it becomes a creature. Otherwise, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
